trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format" /> events of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà gli eventi <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse" /> e <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler>, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi in uso, aggiungere all'evento un'istanza del delegato.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegate to both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> events, and adds the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: esempio viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>, aggiunge un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventHandler> delegato sia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> eventi e aggiunge il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controllare tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The `DecimalToCurrency` event delegate, added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> event, formats the bound value (a <xref:System.Decimal> type) as currency using the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il `DecimalToCurrency` delegato dell'evento, aggiungere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Format> evento, formatta il valore associato (un <xref:System.Decimal> tipo) come valuta utilizzando il <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The `CurrencyToDecimal` event delegate, added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the <xref:System.Decimal> type.
trans-unit.target: Il `CurrencyToDecimal` delegato dell'evento, aggiungere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.Parse> evento, converte il valore visualizzato dal controllo al <xref:System.Decimal> tipo.
